title: Hovenweep National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park        These ancestral Puebloan structures have stood for 700 years. NPS Photo by Jacob W. Frank   Â     Stay up to date with the latest News, see news releases, and join the park's online communities.    In Photos & Multimedia, you can browse through photos of Hovenweep.    History & Culture reveals the stories of the last 10,000 years of human habitation at Hovenweep.   In Nature, learn about the park's plant and animal life.    Education is the place for teachers to plan a field trip and find lesson plans.    Find activities for Kids & Youth to do during your visit to Hovenweep.    In Management, learn more about park laws and policies.
